synopsis.text: These selected few, possessing blank Books of Fate, are the only hope against the nefarious Chaos Tellers, who manipulate others' destinies for their own twisted amusement. In a world where everyone's life is predetermined by the Story Tellers, these blank-book holders are the anomalies, shunned by society and forced to embark on a journey to find purpose. As they traverse through lands inhabited by beloved fairy tale characters, they must work together to restore balance to the world and reclaim their own stories. Follow Ex, Reina, Tao, and Shane as they challenge the Chaos Tellers and rewrite the narrative of their own lives.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
